fields_of_interest: Taxation, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Implementation of the EU Tobacco Products Directive (TPD), process for the adoption and implementation of a New EU Tax Directive.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Union for International Cancer Control (UICC), Framework Convention Alliance for Tobacco Control (FCA), Nordic Cancer Union (NCU), Smoke Free Partnership (SFP), Non-communicable Diseases Alliance (NCD Alliance), Oslo Cancer Cluster  
https://kreftforeningen.no/en/international-collaboration/
goals__remit:
NCS works continuously to improve society’s attitude to the prevention and treatment of cancer. We fight cancer locally, nationally and globally through research and preventive measures, information, support, advice and advocacy. 
 
In addition to cancer prevention and Control, we work in partnership With sister organisations and policy and decision makers for the prevention and Control of non-communicable diseases by addressing risk factors and the Commercial determinants of Health.
